get.description:
Get weather information and 24-hour forecast for a specified country code and city.

Args:
    country_code (str): Two-letter country code (e.g., "TN", "DE", "FR")
    city (str): City name (e.g., "Tunis", "Berlin", "Paris")

Returns:
    WeatherResponse: Weather information including location details and 24-hour forecast
